name: Peter Laughner
description:
'''Peter Laughner''' (August 22, 1952 – June 22, 1977) was an American [[guitarist]], [[songwriter]] and [[singing|singer]].

A native of [[Bay Village, Ohio]], Laughner was described by [[Richie Unterberger]] as "probably the single biggest catalyst in the birth of [[Cleveland punk|Cleveland's alternative rock]] scene in the mid 1970s."
